refnamediv.refpurpose: convert a Tesseract DAWG to a wordlist

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: dawg2wordlist(1) converts a Tesseract Directed Acyclic Word Graph (DAWG) to a list of words using a unicharset as key.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.simpara: UNICHARSET The unicharset of the language. This is the unicharset generated by mftraining(1).
DAWG The input DAWG, created by wordlist2dawg(1)
WORDLIST Plain text (output) file in UTF-8, one word per line

refsect1.title: COPYING
refsect1.simpara: Copyright (C) 2012 Google, Inc. Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.simpara: The Tesseract OCR engine was written by Ray Smith and his research groups at Hewlett Packard (1985-1995) and Google (2006-present).
